description: This Python script initializes various knowledge bases (CSV, PDF URL, Website, Local PDF), combines them into a single knowledge base, and sets up an agent to interact with this combined knowledge. It also runs asynchronous loading and querying functions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: CombinedKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that aggregates multiple sources such as CSV, PDF, and website data.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base for CSV documents stored locally.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base for local PDF documents.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base for PDFs accessible via URLs.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Vector database interface for PostgreSQL using pgvector.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a query.
